item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (96 points | 45 comments)
2. The Unplanned Impact of Mathematics (2011) (36 points | 8 comments)
3. Show HN: BunkerWeb – The Open-Source Web Application Firewall (WAF) (61 points | 7 comments)
4. Romania cancels election after systems targeted in cyberattacks (75 points | 33 comments)
5. The dogs of Chernobyl: Insights into populations in the nuclear exclusion zone (12 points | discuss)
6. TikTok divestment law upheld by federal appeals court (66 points | 67 comments)
7. Show HN: Hacker Herald – like HN but with crowdsourced pics and subtitles (134 points | 50 comments)
8. ExxonMobil's Alleged Hack-for-Hire Campaign Targeting Climate Activists (138 points | 24 comments)
9. Show HN: Prompt Engine – Auto pick LLMs based on your prompts (55 points | 12 comments)
10. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (43 points | 27 comments)
11. Debian opens a can of username worms (95 points | 126 comments)
12. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (254 points | 86 comments)
13. RankScience (YC W17) is hiring to supercharge SEO for startups ( | hide)
14. Contradictions in photography advice (30 points | 42 comments)
15. Constraints Are Good: Python's Metadata Dilemma (21 points | 2 comments)
16. Sensible SQLite Defaults (36 points | 8 comments)
17. Intuitive introverts lead the most successful teams: study (45 points | 22 comments)
18. Can a Comma Solve a Crime? (27 points | 21 comments)
19. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (350 points | 221 comments)
20. Intel’s board, and an example of when boards and short-termism fail (296 points | 212 comments)
21. We fixed our documentation with the Diátaxis framework (33 points | 10 comments)
22. Show HN: Piazza, syncing the web in a vectorized DB (8 points | 3 comments)
23. The 70% problem: Hard truths about AI-assisted coding (460 points | 362 comments)
24. Why is printer ink so expensive? (54 points | 65 comments)
25. New Box64 v0.3.2 and Box86 v0.3.8 released (Native Flags, Benchmarks, Box32) (5 points | 3 comments)
26. Gordon Letwin OS/2 Usenet post (1995) (82 points | 61 comments)
27. There Are No More Dogs in Antarctica (103 points | 72 comments)
28. Rivian Is Opening Its Charging Network to Other EVs (40 points | 30 comments)
29. Faux Friendship (2009) (6 points | 1 comment)
30. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (244 points | 213 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
